{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Virgin Media |model=Super Hub |revision=1 (VMDG480) |asin=B00BRWMO5E;GB; |est_release_date=01/2011 |fcc_date=02/16/2010 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Pegatron |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=Europe only |type=cable modem, wireless router |fcc_id=VUIUPWL6024 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM3380 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, J303 |wi1_module=Pegatron UPWL6024 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (half) |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43224 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53115S |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=DOCSIS 3.0 |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=''randomly generated'' |oui= |oui_eth= }} This device is a '''NETGEAR''' VMDG480 / CG3101D distributed :by '''{{Used by service|Virgin Media}}''' within Europe ('''UK''' only?).
*[http://cdkr.co.uk/projects/computers/virgin_VMDG480/ ''VMDG480 Modem Teardown'' on '''CDKR Web'''] (down ATM) :notes the wireless module as the '''[[Pegatron]]''' UPWL6024 - the FCC ID :+ approval date of the UPWL6024 has been assigned to this entry
===See also=== *[[Virgin Media Super Hub 1]] - Netgear VMDG480 / CG3101D *[[Virgin Media Super Hub 2]] - Netgear VMDG485 / CG4000TD *[[Virgin Media Super Hub 2ac]] - Netgear VMDG490 / SH2AC • [https://www.techradar.com/reviews/pc-mac/networking-and-wi-fi/modem-routers/virgin-media-super-hub-2ac-1293173/review Review] *[[Virgin Media Super Hub 3]] - Arris VMDG505 / TG2492LG • [https://www.techradar.com/reviews/virgin-media-super-hub-3 Review]
